TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);
type WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler = delegate of obj * WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 的 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是 为类的事件定义的。 The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 可以通过在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**的子例程来访问类的事件。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 事件在事件期间引发。The event is raised during the event. 使用 IIS 提供的Windows 标识构造对象,并将其传递给 WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件。The constructs a object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 可以使用提供给 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件的对象的属性, 将当前的属性设置为自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未在 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件期间为属性指定值, 则 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识将用作当前请求的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证, 则 对象的属性将设置为该方法返回的标识。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property of the object is set to the identity returned by the method. 仅当身份验证 设置为, 并且是应用程序的活动HTTP模块时,才会引发WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate事件。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件将当前 的属性设置为自定义对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
